name: Focused Animal Expertise
text: You’re skilled at patiently hiding from your favored enemies, particularly animals.
benefit: You gain a bonus on Stealth checks equal to half your favored enemy (animal) bonus. Against animals, this bonus is equal to your full favored enemy bonus.
text_zh: 你很擅长耐心地躲避你的宿敌，尤其是动物。
benefit_zh: 你获得等于你宿敌（动物）加值一半的隐匿检定加值。在对抗动物时，这个加值等于你完整的宿敌加值。
